channel.title: Blogs on Kacy's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Kacy's blog

item.title: Blog
item.description: Github page is providing free online static page which is freeee~ It is expensive to hold a website server on AWS. Also there are so many random attack from the online to the cloud server. It is not friendly for user who just want to maintain the website for blog…. Therefore, starting a static page in github maybe is a easier way for the blog. (For people don’t want to use existing online blog plaform)
